name: CVE-2009-1264
description: Frontend User Registration (sr_feuser_register) extension 2.5.20 and earlier for TYPO3 does not properly verify access rights, which allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information such as passwords via unknown attack vectors.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:typo3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:stanislas_rolland:sr_feuser_register:2.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:stanislas_rolland:sr_feuser_register:2.5:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:stanislas_rolland:sr_feuser_register:2.5.10:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:stanislas_rolland:sr_feuser_register:2.2.8:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:stanislas_rolland:sr_feuser_register:2.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:stanislas_rolland:sr_feuser_register:1.6:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:stanislas_rolland:sr_feuser_register:2.2.7:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:stanislas_rolland:sr_feuser_register:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:stanislas_rolland:sr_feuser_register:2.2.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:stanislas_rolland:sr_feuser_register:1.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:stanislas_rolland:sr_feuser_register:2.3.6:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
